@graph.name: Zauberkugel
@graph.description:
Protein target prediction of a bioactive ligand with Align-it and ePharmaLib

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Protein target prediction of a bioactive ligand with Align-it and ePharmaLib](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/computational-chemistry/tutorials/zauberkugel/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
